segments.text: How do you decide what grade we get ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I look at many things , attendance , quizzes , and tests .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What is the most important factor ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Obviously I look for improvement as we go along , but I would like you to do your best from the beginning .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How can we keep track of our grades ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The final and midterm are 40 percent of your grade ; homework , attendance , and quizzes total 60 percent .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What if we can't get to school ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can only miss one class without penalty .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If we have a major problem , will you let us know ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will be letting you know during the year if you have a major problem .
segments.speaker: S2
